meaning: steam, heat, sultry, foment, get musty

onyomiExamples.meaning: steam, vapour, vapor, steamboat, steam locomotive
evaporation, disappearance (of people intentionally concealing their whereabouts), unexplained disappearance
bamboo steamer, steaming basket, wooden frame holder with reed base used to steam food over a pot, soba served on a small wickerwork tray, wickerwork tray (for serving soba)
steaming (of food) using a bamboo steamer

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to steam (food, towel, etc.), to be hot and humid, to be sultry
to be stuffy, to moulder, to molder
